### 🧭 About me

- 🏗️ **Product Engineer** with 10+ years turning government IT systems from mundane to meaningful — I own the full product lifecycle and love making tech that actually works for people

- ⚡ **Bitcoin enthusiast & developer** building the future and exploring self-sovereign computing and energy preservation

- 🗺️ **GIS specialist** working with Esri tools like ArcGIS Online and ArcGIS Pro to build mapping solutions that solve real problems

- 🔮 **Creative explorer** with an insatiable curiosity for AI, creative writing, and software design — constantly experimenting with new ways to blend technology and creativity

- 🌱 **Lifelong learner** who transitioned from Science and Public Health into tech, bringing a fresh perspective and ability to bridge technical and business worlds

- 🤝 **Open collaborator** who enjoys sharing knowledge about spirituality, bitcoin, and technology — always seeking meaningful projects

### 🔨 Tech I enjoy

`TypeScript/JavaScript` · `React/Next.js` · `Node.js` · `Python` · `MS SQL` · `Lightning Network` · `NWC` · `ArcGIS Pro`

### 🌱 Featured projects

| Project                                                          | What it does                                                                                                               | Tech                                                                        |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Personal Site](https://github.com/saucy-tech/personal-site)** | Modern portfolio with integrated Lightning payments, custom blog, and dark mode — focused on accessibility and performance | `Next.js 14` · `React` · `TypeScript` · `Tailwind` · `MDX` · `@getalby/sdk` |
| **[Lightning Tip Jar](https://github.com/saucy-tech/lntipjar)**  | Seamless Bitcoin tipping interface with NWC support for instant Lightning payments                                         | `Next.js` · `React` · `TypeScript` · `NWC` · `@getalby/sdk`                 |
| **SAT Sort** _(Coming Soon)_                                     | Privacy-focused Bitcoin lot manager with HIFO cost-basis tracking, on-chain fee estimation, and local-first data storage   | `React` · `Node.js` · `SQLite` · `Bitcoin Core RPC`                         |
